question: What is the range of heading tags in HTML?

In HTML, data inside a

tag are:
options: Ignored and collapsed into a single space
answer: Ignored and collapsed into a single space

question: Which of the following are Unpaired tags?
In HTML, text inside the <pre> tag:
options: Preserves all spaces and line breaks exactly as typed
answer: Preserves all spaces and line breaks exactly as typed

question: Which of the following are inline HTML elements?
Which statement is true about <span>?
options: It displays text exactly as typed and preserves all spaces and line breaks
It represents a portion of text inside a paragraph.
It automatically creates a new paragraph
It is a block-level element that starts on a new line
answer: It represents a portion of text inside a paragraph.

question: Which of the following are block-level HTML elements?
Which of the following are paired tags?
Every HTML element contains which of the following?
options: Start / Opening Tag – marks the beginning of an element
End / Closing Tag – marks the end of an element
Content – the text or data contained within the element
Attribute – provides extra information to the element
Value – the value assigned to the attribute
